original_text: His breath is like a flood of water that pours out over his enemies. The water reaches as high as their necks. He shakes the nations in a sieve to destroy the bad parts. He leads them away from their bad ways, like a man who leads a horse with a rope. His breath is like a flood of water that pours out over his enemies. The water reaches as high as their necks. He shakes the nations in a sieve to destroy the bad parts. He leads them away from their bad ways, like a man who leads a horse with a rope.
korean_text: 그의 호흡은 마치 창일하여 목에까지 미치는 하수 같은즉 그가 멸하는 키로 열방을 까부르며 여러 민족의 입에 미혹하는 재갈을 물리시리니

sentences.original_text: His breath is like a flood of water
that pours out over his enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그의 원수 위로 쏟아져 내립니다

sentences.original_text: The water reaches as high as their necks
He shakes the nations in a sieve
He leads them away from their bad ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 그들의 나쁜 길에서 이끌어냅니다

sentences.original_text: like a man who leads a horse with a rope
